about_the_game:
Welcome to Marble Race Creator, the ultimate 2D marble racing sandbox game where you can unleash your creativity and build your own unique tracks and races using the built-in editor. With a wide variety of marbles to choose from, you can customize your experience and create the perfect race.

In Marble Race Creator, you have the power to design every aspect of your race, from the twists and turns of the track to the obstacles that challenge your marbles. You can use a variety of tools and features to create the perfect course, including bridges, painting, fine tuning and even obstacles like rotators, magnets and bumpers.

Once you've built your race, it's time to let your marbles loose and see who comes out on top. Watch as your marbles navigate the twists and turns of your course, avoiding obstacles and battling it out for the top spot. With realistic physics and stunning graphics, you'll feel like you're watching a real marble race unfold right before your eyes.
